text: Gilbert Lindsay Park is an urban park located in Los Angeles City Council District 9, Los Angeles, California. It features fields/courts for soccer, baseball, and basketball, as well as an indoor gym, an auditorium, and a preschool.http://www.laparks.org/reccenter/gilbert-w-lindsay LAParks The Park is the former site of the Los Angeles Angels baseball park Wrigley Field. ==References== Category:Parks in California Category:Parks in Los Angeles County, California Category:Parks in Los Angeles
title: Gilbert Lindsay Park
